scripts.lint: yarn run lint:js && yarn run lint:sol

scripts.dist: yarn run dist:leverage && yarn run dist:holder

scripts.dist:holder: truffle-flattener ./contracts/HolderOne.sol > HolderOne.full.sol && solcjs --bin --abi --optimize HolderOne.full.sol && mv HolderOne_full_sol_HolderOne.bin HolderOne.full.bin && mv HolderOne_full_sol_HolderOne.abi HolderOne.full.abi && rm *_sol_*
